Package com.krab.lazy

Class KeyState

java.lang.Object
com.krab.lazy.KeyState
public class KeyState extends Object
Data transfer object for representing a keyboard button state.
See Also:
  • Input

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    boolean
    down
    True during any frame the button is physically down in the active position.
    int
    framePressed
    What the frameCount was equal to last time released was true for this key or keyCode.
    int
    frameReleased
    What the frameCount was equal to last time pressed was true for this key or keyCode.
    boolean
    pressed
    True for one frame after the button is pushed down to its active position.
    boolean
    released
    True for one frame after the button is released up from its active position into the idle position.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    KeyState(boolean down, boolean pressed, boolean released)
    Used internally by the InputWatcherBackend.

  • Method Summary

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • down

      public boolean down
      True during any frame the button is physically down in the active position.

    • pressed

      public boolean pressed
      True for one frame after the button is pushed down to its active position. Also sets framePressed to the current frameCount when true.

    • released

      public boolean released
      True for one frame after the button is released up from its active position into the idle position. Also sets frameReleased to the current frameCount when true.

    • framePressed

      public int framePressed
      What the frameCount was equal to last time released was true for this key or keyCode. Equal to -Integer.MAX_VALUE rather than 0 by default to not display an animation on startup when using norm(frameCount, framePressed, framePressed + animationDuration)

    • frameReleased

      public int frameReleased
      What the frameCount was equal to last time pressed was true for this key or keyCode. Equal to -Integer.MAX_VALUE rather than 0 by default to not display an animation on startup when using norm(frameCount, frameReleased, frameReleased + animationDuration)

  • Constructor Details

    • KeyState

      public KeyState(boolean down, boolean pressed, boolean released)
      Used internally by the InputWatcherBackend. Not meant to be user-facing.
      Parameters:
      down - is the key currently down?
      pressed - was the key just pressed?
      released - was the key just released?
